data.system_settings: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS, Asus Netbook F551C, Intel Core i3 64bits
data.actual_result: The channels are actually marked as read, but the unread indicators will stay until your refresh Discord with Ctrl+R
data.expected_result: All channels in the server are marked as read and all unread indicators will go away instantly
data.short_description: When you mark a whole server as read, the unread white dot indicators won't diseappear until you Ctrl+R Discord
data.steps_to_repro: - Find a server with many unread channels - Right click on server icon and "Mark as Read". Only reproducable for servers, not for channels or categories
